analyzed: ādi buddha dvādaśaka stotram
om namaḥ ādibuddhāya
namaḥ te buddha rūpāya dharma rūpāya te namaḥ
namaḥ te saṃgha rūpāya pañca buddha ātmane namaḥ
pṛthvī rūpāya ap rūpāya tejaḥ rūpāya te namaḥ
namaḥ te vāyu rūpāya ākāśa rūpāya te namaḥ  /
brahmaṇe sattva rūpāya rajaḥ rūpāya viṣṇave
tamaḥ rūpa mahā īśāya jñāna rūpāya te namaḥ
prajñā upāya ātma rūpāya guhya rūpāya te namaḥ
diś rūpa lokapālāya viśvarūpāya te namaḥ  /
cakṣuḥ rūpāya karṇāya ghrāṇa rūpāya jihvake
kāya rūpāya śrī dharma rūpāya manase namaḥ
namaḥ te rūpa rūpāya rasa rūpāya te namaḥ
gandha rūpa śabda rūpa sparśa rūpāya te namaḥ
dharma rūpa dhārakāya ṣaṣ indriya ātmane namaḥ
māṃsa asthi meda majjānām saṃghāta rūpiṇe namaḥ

original: rūpāya jaṅgamānāṃ te sthāvarāṇāṃ ca murtaye |
analyzed: rūpāya jaṅgamānām te sthāvarāṇām ca murtaye
tiraścām moha rūpāya rūpāya āścarya mūrtaye
sṛṣṭi kartre mṛtyave

original: bhavyāya vṛddharūpāya bālāya te namo namaḥ || 9 ||
analyzed: bhavyāya vṛddha rūpāya bālāya te namaḥ namaḥ
prāṇa apāna samāna udāna vyāna mūrtaye namaḥ
varṇa apavarṇa rūpāya bhoktre tad mūrtaye namaḥ
dina rūpāya sūryāya candrāya rātri rūpiṇe
tithi rūpāya nakṣatra yoga vāra ādi murtaye
bāhya abhyantara rūpāya laukikāya namaḥ namaḥ
nairvāṇāya namaḥ tubhyam bahurūpāya te namaḥ
ādibuddha dvādaśakam puṇyam prātar paṭhiṣyati
yat icchati labhet nūnam manujaḥ nitya niścayaḥ
śrī mañjuśrī kṛtam ādi buddha dvādaśaka stotram samāptam
